definition: regional folk song popular during a certain period of time
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The designer framework calls this method when it's looking for a service implementation on a site.
sentences.chinese: 設計器框架在站點上查找服務實現時調用該方法。

sentences.english: This method causes the swappable system to be invoked when the entire page is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 該方法在整個頁面加載時調用這個可切換系統。

sentences.english: You pass in a function to both of them; the function is called when something happens.
sentences.chinese: 您傳入一個函數給這兩者，當有事發生時調用此函數。

sentences.english: This weekend is Daylight Savings Time.
sentences.chinese: 本週末是冬夏時調整日。

sentences.english: Adjust the heat when you are out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 當你不在房間內時調節供暖溫度。

definition: my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to reflect on one's past errors
location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM
to win power/to get authority/to become dominant
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
